task.name: g.dirseps
task.label: Internal GRASS utility for converting directory separator characters.
task.description: Converts any directory separator characters in the input string to or from native host format, and writes the changed path to standard output. Useful in scripts for Windows compatibility.

parameter.name: path
parameter.description: Path to be converted (read from stdin if not specified)

flag.name: h
flag.description: Convert directory separators to native host format

flag.name: g
flag.description: Convert directory separators to GRASS internal format
